title: Stone Type Foundry Announces Lower Prices
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080228040426/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 20.Feb.2008 5.41pm 

[Stone Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20080228040426/http:/www.stonetypefoundry.com/) sends word of lower prices ... Educational computer labs at colleges & universities library license for only $300 ... Plus many more specimens!!
author: Miss Tiffany
